channel.title: Quick prayers small bug
channel.description: My Quick Prayers/Quick Curses are done, but wh[en testing them i noticed one small thing. If i push a prayer in the quickprayers/quickcurses interface it doesn't tick the small bubbles.. small bubbles:l [IMG]http://www.truploader.com/uploads/11_4_2011/272230quickprayer.jpg[/img] When i select a prayer it doesn't tick the red thing in the bubbles. I'll pay $10 to anyone adding this/fixing to both quick prayers/quick curses. I want it so when u select it , it will add the red sprite, and if u select again it removes the sprite... The sprite that the bubble should change to when clicked first time: [IMG]http://www.truploader.com/uploads/11_4_2011/152489SPRITE2.png[/img] add my msn [email]gabbe_impactpk@live.com[/email] - EDIT: Don't know if it's serverside/client so w.e posted here, oh and source is PI

item.title: Quick prayers small bug

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Make it a config button, it won’t be perfect, but it would be better than what it currently is.

When i select a prayer it doesn’t tick the red thing in the bubbles.
